forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the light of day settles over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere dances between sunshine and the gentle stirrings of wind, hinting at the day’s pleasant character. With temperatures hovering around a comfortable 67 degrees, the city basks under a mostly sunny sky, while a west-southwest breeze, weaving its way through the streets, brings with it whispers of the sea. Gusts, bold yet playful, may catch your hat—a reminder that even in this serene setting, Mother Nature has her moods.

As evening descends, expect clouds to gather subtly, casting a soft shadow against twilight. The forecast speaks of patchy drizzle after midnight, a tender kiss from the moisture-laden air, though the chance remains slight, leaving room for an ultimately gentle night. With temperatures dipping to a mild 57 degrees, a light jacket will suffice; perhaps a favorite scarf for comfort, as the chill bites softly in the shadows. Such a day invites leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to a quaint café, where one can sip warm coffee and watch the city transition from day to night.
